text: Robert John Baker (26 July 1939 â€“ November 2021) was a British screenwriter. He was known for writing the Wallace and Gromit movies The Wrong Trousers, A Close Shave and Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit and A Matter of Loaf and Death. Baker was born in Bristol, England. His career began in 1971 and he retired in 2010. Baker died in Stroud, Gloucestershire in November 2021, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British television writers Category:British screenwriters Category:Writers from Bristol
